attributes.action:
visitors to the UK for a Holiday to pay for 
“Holiday Visa”
attributes.additional_details:
Egypt holiday visa £25 each 
Charge Egyptian holiday makers £25 each to holiday in the Uk
attributes.background:
I go on holiday to Egypt, Turkey and the United States .
I have to pay for a visa to visit these countries for each member of my family
I propose that all countries that charge the UK holiday maker for a holiday visa should have to pay for a holiday visa

rejection.details:
Visitors to the UK from certain countries already have to pay for a Visitor visa. You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/standard-visitor-visa
